column4: hi folks, i'm trying to get the wireless reworking on my gf's ubuntu box
i don't know why it stopped
but it seemed to change after a kernel upgrade
i moved from a bcm43xx chip to a ipw2100 to test
you don't even know what i'm running
have you verified your routing table?
even if the wired works fine?
i got a similar problem with my Dell D620. The wireless was fine, but the the routing table was screwd.
i deleted all the routing rules by hand (the init script was useless for that), rerouted everything "in the right way" and bum: everything went fine.
the wired interface is working ok?
